Package doa.engine.graphics

Class DoaAnimation

java.lang.Object
doa.engine.graphics.DoaAnimation
public class DoaAnimation
extends java.lang.Object
Objects of this class are responsible for providing support for sprite based animations. In order to facilitate this class' objects, one must use the factory methods inside DoaAnimations class.
  • DoaAnimations.createAnimation(String, String, long)
  • DoaAnimations.createAnimation(String, List, long)
Since:
DoaEngine 2.2
Version:
3.0
Author:
Doga Oruc
See Also:
DoaAnimations

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.awt.image.BufferedImage current()
    Retrieves the sprite at sprite pointer.
    long getDelay()  
    int getFrameCount()  
    java.util.List<java.awt.image.BufferedImage> getFrames()  
    int getIndex()
    Returns the current index of the sprite to render.
    java.awt.image.BufferedImage next()
    Advances the sprite pointer to the next index, retrieves the sprite at that index; loops back to beginning if there are no more sprites on the buffer, and returns the sprite.
    void reset()
    Resets the next sprite to render to the first frame in the animation.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • getFrames

      public java.util.List<java.awt.image.BufferedImage> getFrames()
      Returns:
      a list containing the frames of this animation

    • getDelay

      public long getDelay()
      Returns:
      the delay between each frame of this animation in milliseconds

      public int getFrameCount()
      Returns:
      the number of frames of this animation

    • current

      Retrieves the sprite at sprite pointer.
      Returns:
      current sprite to render

    • next

      public java.awt.image.BufferedImage next()
      Advances the sprite pointer to the next index, retrieves the sprite at that index; loops back to beginning if there are no more sprites on the buffer, and returns the sprite.
      Returns:
      the next sprite to render

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the next sprite to render to the first frame in the animation.

    • getIndex

      public int getIndex()
      Returns the current index of the sprite to render.
      Returns:
      the sprite to renders index
